body_html: @asimshankar It would be vastly slower to implement this as a composite op, and might not even handle corner cases correctly. Since Eigen now has an arg functor, we should use it. I'm OK with deferring the GPU versions until the issues have been resolved.
body_text: @asimshankar It would be vastly slower to implement this as a composite op, and might not even handle corner cases correctly. Since Eigen now has an arg functor, we should use it. I'm OK with deferring the GPU versions until the issues have been resolved.
